name: L'Oreal Paris Bonding Shampoo for Color Treated Hair, Strengthens and Repairs Weak Hair Bonds, Sulfate Free & Vegan Hair Care, EverPure, 6.8 Fl Oz
short_description: EverPure Bond Repair Shampoo and Conditioner Set: Repairs hair's strength in just one use with system of pre shampoo treatment, shampoo and conditioner. Strengthens hair and reduces hair breakage for revitalized silky, smooth hair without weigh down
Sulfate Free Shampoo: Colored, bleached or damaged hair can become weak on the inside and out. Our shampoo contains citric acid to penetrate the hair cortex to help rebuild weak hair bonds

Hair Repair Routine: Use system 1-3x a week to strengthen and repair weak hair bonds. Prep with the Pre Shampoo Treatment. Apply 1 inch from roots, rake through lengths. Leave on 5-10 minutes, then rinse. Follow with Bond Repair Shampoo and Conditioner

Vegan Shampoo: EverPure hair products have the purest respect for your hair and have been formulated without sulfates, parabens, DMDM hydantoin, added phthalates, dyes and gluten ingredients. Always color caring and powered by science

L'Oreal Paris Innovation: We are a total beauty care company that combines the latest in technology with the highest in quality for the ultimate in hair color, hair care, hair style, skin care and cosmetics
product_description: Rebuild damaged, weak hair bonds with our EverPure Bonding Hair Care System. Made with citric acid to repair and strengthen for healthier and smoother hair. When hair is colored, bleached and damaged it can become weak on the inside and out. EverPure Bond Repair Shampoo and Conditioner system with citric acid penetrates inside the hair cortex to help rebuild weak hair bonds. Repairs hair's strength in just one use with system. Scientifically tested to strengthen hair and reduce breakage. For smoother hair than with the number one prestige routine*. *On wet (damaged) hair in instrumental test. Leading prestige routine based on NPD full year data.

product_description: Discover Invigo Brilliance Color Protection Shampoo designed to maintain color vibrancy and protect colored hair. This shampoo is specially formulated with Brilliance-Blend™: this includes copper encapsulating molecules that help to maintain vibrancy. It also contains histidine and vitamin E help to control the oxidation process after coloration and to protect color. It's optimized low pH formula also helps to close the cuticle after coloration in order to enable a better color retention, giving the hair an excellent feel

CHI SHAMPOOS & CONDITIONERS: CHI shampoos and conditioners are sulfate-free and paraben-free.
HOW TO USE: Shampoo hair from roots to ends. Rinse and follow with CHI Color Lock Conditioner.

CHI: Founded by Farouk Shami, a hairdresser allergic to ammonia who sought to create the first ammonia-free hair color & has remained committed to crafting the finest ethical haircare. All CHI products are cruelty-free, paraben-free, & sulfate-free.
